text:
There's a seminar happening from Hiroki Ueda (CUBIC inventor), but not specifically on clearing. I wonder if it'll involve any lightsheet and clearing?

Peter Khloen asked me to forward to interested parties! 

MRC Prion Unit at UCL Hybrid Seminar: Professor Hiroki Ueda

01 May 2024, 1:00 pm–2:00 pm

Towards Human Systems Biology of Sleep/Wake Cycles: Phosphorylation Hypothesis of Sleep

Time: May 1, 2024 01:00 PM London

Join Zoom Meeting
